content.raw:
After `make install`, it has the [following error](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo9-debbuilder/8/console):

~~~
make[1]: Entering directory '/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo9-debbuilder/build/gazebo'
dh_strip -a --dbg-package=gazebo9-dbg
make[1]: Leaving directory '/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo9-debbuilder/build/gazebo'
   dh_makeshlibs -O--parallel
   dh_shlibdeps -O--parallel
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_gui.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gz-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_client.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gz-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_physics.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gz-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_util.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gz-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_transport.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gz-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_msgs.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gz-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_common.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gz-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gzserver-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_util.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gzserver-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_common.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gzserver-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_gui.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gzclient-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_common.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gzclient-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: couldn't find library libgazebo_common.so.9 needed by debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gazebo-9.0.1 (ELF format: 'elf64-x86-64'; RPATH: '')
dpkg-shlibdeps: error: cannot continue due to the errors listed above
Note: libraries are not searched in other binary packages that do not have any shlibs or symbols file.
To help dpkg-shlibdeps find private libraries, you might need to use -l.
dh_shlibdeps: dpkg-shlibdeps -Tdebian/gazebo9.substvars debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gzclient-9.0.1 debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gz-9.0.1 debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gazebo-9.0.1 debian/gazebo9/usr/bin/gzserver-9.0.1 returned exit code 2
debian/rules:66: recipe for target 'binary' failed
make: *** [binary] Error 2
~~~

cc @\_jrivero_
